title: 00x3: Exemption at 18 U.S.C. § 208(b)(4) for Financial Interests in a Birthright
summary: OGE decided that the exemption at 18 U.S.C. § 208(b)(4) is limited to circumstances where the employee holds a financial interest by birthright, and even then, the exemption could not operate to exempt imputed financial interests of an organization for which the employee serves as a director.
